topic: Five dimensions of scaling democratic deliberation: With and beyond AI
description:
üìÖ Event details: [https://lu.ma/sp12xakw](https://lu.ma/sp12xakw)

Agree/Disagree should be easy. If it's not, just PASS. Considering submitting improved phrasing you could easily take position on.

Bonus points if you have a clear position you think might be uncommon. TROLLING welcome. Divides add resolution to edges of groups. More groups = more story.
